name: Son Shortlegs
description:
You are Son Shortlegs, son of Daddy Longlegs. Unfortunately, you have very short legs, so you can't jump and rely on jump pads to go up. You have to land in the holes because the ground is filled with thistles, which you can't get out of when you land in them.

Game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1. This is also my first game jam.

How to play: 

You automatically move to the right. Press space, left arrow, A or click to go to the left in the air. Try to land in the holes and don't land on the thistles on the surface.

Made by Herre Torensma.

Tools:

  • Godot 3.2
  • Aseprite
  • SFXR
  • Visual Studio Code
